summary: A suite of utilities that implement core Python packaging standards, providing parsers and data models for version strings, specifiers, requirement specifications, environment markers, and wheel compatibility tags, along with platform inspection tools that analyze ELF binaries to determine manylinux and musllinux compatibility.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow to accurately parse, validate, and construct package metadata and wheel tags so that generated Python artifacts are compatible with the appropriate interpreter, ABI, and operating system environments.
